programme.title: Surrogate Mum
programme.desc: Ncholo the local maid is convinced by her boss Scarlet to be a surrogate mother and is promised money after the process, Nine months after, Ncholo refuse to give back the babies.

programme.title: Ikemba
programme.desc: Ikemba, a king, loses his loving and caring wife, but her spirit will not rest as she still loves him even in death and would do anything to keep him to herself.

programme.title: Against My Wish
programme.desc: Adanmas mother dreams of her daughter marrying a wealthy man to lift their family out of poverty. However, Adanma falls in love with Emeka, who is also poor.

programme.title: Painful Soul
programme.desc: Ogechi and her mum are driven away from the community and made an Osu. This story is about to change as frank, the son of an Osu, gets married to the princess.

programme.title: All I Need
programme.desc: Tragedy strikes chief Kolade as he loses his wife and his only daughter. Things fall apart as Obiageli walks into their lives and transform them.

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: Alhaji falls in love with his daughters friend Catherine, but this soon turns out to be sour as Alhaji dies after getting Catharine pregnant and Zainab blames her.

programme.title: Against My Marriage
programme.desc: A desperate wife will do whatever it takes to keep her husband alive. But things take an unexpected turn when she falls pregnant.

programme.title: The Other Side Of Beauty
programme.desc: After dropping off a rider, Patra discovers a significant amount of cash in her car. Her friends are desperate to get their hands on it, but Patra makes sure they dont.

programme.title: Ezeabata
programme.desc: Will Chikadibia save a king who takes refuge with him as his kingdom is taken over by another king?

programme.title: Knock Knock

programme.title: The Burial

programme.title: Cat And Mouse
programme.desc: Constable Zhan Zhao is constantly at loggerheads with Bai Yu Tong. Unbeknownst to Zhan, Bai is a girl subtly vying for his heart amidst their escalating conflicts.

programme.title: Legacy Of Rage
programme.desc: Brandon Lee, the son of Bruce Lee, stars as Brandon Ma - a man seeking revenge on his friend, Michael, who frames him for his own crime and steals the love of his life.

programme.title: Twin Dragons
programme.desc: When long-lost twins, famous pianist John and criminal Boomer, reunite in Hong Kong and accidentally swap lives, Boomer vows to save John from the clutches of gangsters.

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, a police officer teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: Breaking News
programme.desc: A botched police stand-off with a gang of criminals is captured by TV cameras and broadcast live on TV, adding to the woes of the police attempting to nail these bad guys!

programme.title: Seven Warriors
programme.desc: Set in 1930s Guangxi, a group of villagers threatened by bandits hires seven warriors to stop the bandits tyranny, and team up to defeat the bandits in the end.

programme.title: Kungfu Cyborg: Metallic Attraction
programme.desc: An advanced cyborg cop is created as a crime fighter for the villagers in 2046. It can overcome most challenges except for love and battling a rogue cyborg.

programme.title: Helios
programme.desc: When the notorious criminal, Helios steals a powerful weapon from South Korea and attempts to sell it in Hong Kong, the police forces of these two lands must join hands.

programme.title: Seoul Raiders
programme.desc: A special agent from the Japanese National Security teams up with a skilled thief to find a pair of plates used to make counterfeit USD.

programme.title: Special Female Force
programme.desc: Fa and five female cadets team up to join a formerly disbanded all-female elite force to hunt down terrorist Gu, the man who killed Fas mother twenty years ago.

programme.title: The Monkey King
programme.desc: Monkey King emerges after Goddess Nuwas sacrifice to challenge the Jade Emperor, causing chaos that enables Buffalo Demon to wage war in heaven.

programme.title: The Most Wanted
programme.desc: A botched police raid leads to a suspected betrayal of an undercover cop. As he is put on the most wanted list by both police and the triad, can he prove his innocence?

programme.title: Fire of Conscience
programme.desc: Detective Manfred teams up with Inspector Kee to investigate a homicide. As corruption surfaces, Manfred unravels a web of deceit that puts the Hong Kong Police Force at risk.

programme.title: Undercover Punch And Gun
programme.desc: An undercover police officer teams up with unlikely allies in order to fight a powerful drug dealer and take down a drug smuggling ring.

programme.title: Widow Warriors
programme.desc: When the men in a triad family are betrayed and gunned down by a rival gang, their wives decide to take revenge for the death of their husbands.

programme.title: The Fortune Code
programme.desc: Set in World War II, a secret agent is tasked with the mission to rescue Mammon, who knows the code to a $500 billion fund for the Chinese army.

programme.title: Invincible Dragon
programme.desc: An undercover agent helps the police to solve mysterious cases, making him a rising star. However, his impulsive personality drags him into endless troubles.

programme.title: The Gangster, The Cop, The Devil
programme.desc: Adapted from real events, the story is about a police special team fighting underground criminal organizations with wit and bravery, finally wiping out the enemy.

programme.title: Zu: Warriors From Magic Mountain
programme.desc: A young warrior teams up with his master and a band of heroes to find two celestial swords, so as to fight the Blood Demon seeking to wreak havoc upon the world.

programme.title: 3AM The Office
programme.desc: A newcomer offends the ghosts in his office on his first day at work and experiences spooky encounters during night shifts, making him reflect on his behaviour.

programme.title: The Last Blood
programme.desc: The Dalai Lama and Bees girlfriend are injured by the Red Army. Bee must find the only 3 donors with rare blood type P in 12 hours and fight against the terrorists to save them.

programme.title: VR Fighter
programme.desc: Bodyguard Long Wei becomes a VR fighter with a newly invented armour from a technology firm. When some armed men break into the firm, a fierce battle has just begun...

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, imperial guard Ocean secretly frees a kind monster gifted by Brunei, sparking a palace bounty and a frantic hunt to capture it.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: An accomplished cop who sinks into a deep depression after his wife was killed, is forced to return to action when a former cop is implicated in a murder case.

programme.title: Motorway
programme.desc: On the streets of Hong Kong, an arrogant rookie cop and his veteran partner confront a legendary getaway driver, using their cars as weapons in a high stakes showdown.

programme.title: Bullets Over Summer
programme.desc: Two unorthodox and reckless detectives who use a demented grannys apartment as a stakeout end up developing romantic relationships with her neighbours.

programme.title: Righting Wrongs
programme.desc: When an important witness and his family are brutally murdered, a furious and disillusioned lawyer decides to dish out his own vigilante justice with his fist.

programme.title: Dragon Squad
programme.desc: A veteran cop leads a team of Interpol agents to track down ruthless mercenaries who kidnapped an accused crime lord on his way to court.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
